desc.p: This is a no-input field where the total number of payments effected through the related FT.BULK.CREDIT record is automatically populated
Represents the ID of the Single.Inward.Bulk Standing Order run on-line. This id is automatically defaulted as id.

Identifies which Single Inward bulk Payments is to be executed online.It must be a valid id in the Live FT.BULK.CREDIT file.Up to 24 type A (alphanumeric) characters allowed.Associated multi value field.Mandatory field
This is a no input field where the total credit value of the FT.BULK.CREDIT record is automatically populated
The ID of the User who approves the FT.BULK.CREDIT record (Verifier) is automatically populated in this field

It is a sequential number which is updated every time when a history file is generated for the application SINGLE.INWARD.BULK.The history number will be updated in the id of the SINGLE.INWARD.BULK.HIST file.When a SINGLE.INWARD.BULK is verified for the first time the HIST.NO will be updated as 1.Every time it is verified 1 will be added to the HIST.NO field of existing record and this will be updated in the live SINGLE.INWARD.BULK file and the old record will be written to SINGLE.INWARD.BULK.HIST file
The ID of the User who created the FT.BULK.CREDIT record (authoriser) is automatically populated in this field
